TopicTitle: My thread seems to be missing

Articles.Content: I posted a topic in the Technical Support (unmodded installs) forum about a bug with shadows, and I was asking how many others experience the same bug, but I cannot find the topic anywhere and it's no longer in my followed threads. Can someone look it up and try to figure out what happened to it? It's just mysteriously missing. I posted it only yesterday, it should still be on the front page.

Can you see it in your activity history on your profile page? You should be able to look there and see "thereaverofdarkness2 started a thread: [thread name] in Technical Support (unmodded installs)" or something.

16 minutes ago, cubinator said:

Can you see it in your activity history on your profile page? You should be able to look there and see "thereaverofdarkness2 started a thread: [thread name] in Technical Support (unmodded installs)" or something.

No, I checked there and it's not there. It doesn't seem to be anywhere on this forum, as if it simply blinked out of existence with nobody any the wiser.

@thereaverofdarkness2

Here's all your activity back to February.

I don't see you starting a thread about shadows, but you posted in a couple. It's possible (and I dare say likely) that your thread was merged with one of the existing ones on the same topic.

Edited June 28, 2016 by Randazzo

3 minutes ago, Randazzo said:

It's possible (and I dare say likely) that your thread was merged with one of the existing ones on the same topic.

I found my thread, it's now a post in another topic. That's a little bit annoying, given it was not the same topic and now it doesn't fit where it is.

1 hour ago, thereaverofdarkness2 said:

I found my thread, it's now a post in another topic. That's a little bit annoying, given it was not the same topic and now it doesn't fit where it is.

You can ask a moderator to un-merge it, I think it's possible but I've never seen it done.
